entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
